actions.text: Committee on Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Sasser. With written report No. 101-426. Additional views filed.

actions.committee: Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, for a period not to exceed 30 days
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, for a period not to exceed 30 days.
Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs discharged. Pursuantto the order of August 4, 1977.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 812.

official_title: An original bill to exclude the Social Security Trust Funds from the deficit calculation.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Preservation Act - Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974, the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act), and the Social Security Act to exclude receipts and disbursements of the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund from deficit calculations.

titles.title: An original bill to exclude the Social Security Trust Funds from the deficit calculation.
